rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance leading to a corridor.
rooms.vastu_compliance: North is considered auspicious for entrances.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious central area with access to the balcony and a view of the garden.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Placed in the South or East section for social interactions.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to living area, designed with open plan.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Placed near the living room for family harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: West-facing kitchen as per traditional Vastu principles.
rooms.vastu_compliance: East of the plot recommended for kitchen but designed here with care to minimize negative influences.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony facing West.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Bedrooms should ideally face North or East for health and prosperity.

rooms.description: Guest bedroom with balcony facing West.
rooms.vastu_compliance: West-facing balconies can be acceptable if balanced with proper design.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with balcony facing West.
rooms.vastu_compliance: West-facing balconies used for aesthetic purposes in a corner plot.

rooms.name: Bathroom

rooms.name: Utility Room

openings.description: Main entrance designed for maximum auspicious energy flow as per Vastu.
Spacious balcony adjoining every bedroom for natural light and ventilation.
Large windows to enhance natural lighting and Vastu balance.
Standard doorways facilitating smooth flow of movement within the house.

special_features.name: Corner Plot Design
special_features.description: The design utilizes the advantages of a corner plot by offering expansive views and multiple facade exposures.

special_features.name: Spacious Balconies
special_features.description: Each bedroom is equipped with a dedicated balcony for relaxation and better air circulation.
